Sidorovich, do you adjust weapons and armour?

Ahh! Do you mean the rifle in the clamp? Yes, it's a really cool one. So, what do you want me to repair? I warn you - it's not cheap work. The more damage, the more the repair will cost.\n \nRepair list:
Repair the weapon in the first slot.
Repair the weapon in the second slot.
Repair the armour.
Hold on, I have a few changes. I will be back later.
Wait, just a moment...\n \nReady!!!
Ahh! Marked One, I see that you have had some lively situations... I know I have plates for armour... Ahh! Here they are...\n \nOk! Here it is, like new!
Excellent work. Where'd you get your skills? Did you pick it up on your own? Well all right, see you later.
A work of a master, I have spent my money well. Thanks.
Can you repair something else?
Ok, let me see.\n \nRepair list:
Barman, can you repair some of my gear?

Honestly, I can't. But in the kitchen I have one Stalker that works for me to pay his debts, he is a great weapon smith. He can repair all your weapons and armor, I will give him the task. So, what do you want to repair?\n \nRepair list:
Repair the weapon in the first slot.
Repair the weapon in the second slot.
Repair the armor.
I seem to be broke. Maybe next time.
Here, it's repaired!
It's done, he fixed everything!
Ahh! Just like new! Your weapon smith is indeed a master! Send him my regards.
Indeed, excellent work!
Can he repair something else?
Of course, he doesn't have a lot to do for the moment.\n \nRepair list:
Could you repair my gear?
Yes, when needed I can distract myself from the researches. But I don't have all the tools, repairing is only a hobby, so it will not be cheap for you.\n \nRepair list:
Repair the weapon in the first slot.
Repair the weapon in the second slot.
Repair the armour.
Oh no, I'm out of cash. Maybe next time.
Wait a moment...\n \nLooks like everything is done, it's all yours!
Armour plating is difficult to find in the Zone, but I have a stock. Wait here...\n \nI've made it with conscience.
Well done! You are an exellent weapon smith.
You will have a clean conscience, the work is quite good!
Could you repair something else?
If I hurry, I might finish before the data is finished being analyzed.\n \nRepair list:
Sorry man, but I'm here to repair something of my gear... what are your prices?

Ahahah... don't worry, I won't screw you, I'm not 'the forgetful one' as everyone thinks. So, what do you wish to repair? This is not cheap work, the more damage, the more it costs. Deal?\n \nRepair list:
Repair the weapon in the first slot.
Repair the weapon in the second slot.
Repair the armor.
I don't have enough money... Let's do it another time.
I have replaced some parts, and greased and cleaned...\n \nHave fun with that!

Marked One, do you have a target sign on your back? Ok, give it to me... I will repair it...\n \nFor you, only fresh armor-plates! And I also have covered that target sign... Oh come on! Don't make that face... I'm just joking!...
Just like new! Excellent work!
Yeah, real funny... Though... you have repaired the armor perfectly... Nevertheless you could have added those two plates that are still on the table... Still, you honour your name!
Can you repair something else?
Certainly, just don't forget to pay, I don't repair for free.\n \nRepair list:
